successes.title: New Carman Album and Music Video
successes.description: Carman fans get ready for a once in a lifetime chance to partner with him to make history with a new CD & Music Video project.

Pledges.description: You will be the first to receive the new single and first music video, one month before the actual release.

You will receive the first single and video (one month before actual street date), plus a download of a live concert. It's the Halloween 3:16 special, the biggest musical soul winning event in TV history. Where over 70,000 people came to Christ in one night.
You will receive, the first single, the video , the live concert, plus the entire brand new album to download and listen to a whole month before anyone can get it in retail.

You will receive the first single, the video , the live concert, the new album download (one month before actual street date) 
plus this all new "Overcomin Child of God" T-Shirt. A 2013 design puts a hot new spin on a classic message. In 35 years of ministry, this "One size fits all" shirt is the fans all-time favorite message and its my all-time favorite design.
You will receive the first single, the video, the live concert, the new album download (one month before actual street date) plus the new CD in the mail.
You will receive the first single, the video, the live concert, the new album download (one month before actual street date), the new CD, plus a limited edition House Of Praise CD.

You will receive the first single, the video , the live concert, the new album download (one month before actual street date), the t-shirt, the new CD, House Of Praise CD, 
plus a personally autographed All New "Game Changer" CD. This CD contains "18 Brand New" recordings, never released to retail outlets. It includes brand new songs like:
"I'm Coming Home" 
"Jesus Heal Me"
and the new patriotic classic "The Flag"
We also re-recorded hits from the 80's and 90's such as:
"Great God"
"I Feel Jesus" 
"Sunday School Rock" 
"Lazarus Come Forth" 
and "The Champion"

You not only receive the single, video, download  (one month before actual street date), t-shirt, the new CD, House of Praise CD, autographed Game Changers CD,
but also "2 VIP tickets" to your choice of any one of my concerts over the next year. Wether it's ticketed or a love offering, these VIP tickets include a FREE CD at the concert and an after show meet and greet so we can say hello in person. Maybe take a picture, sign a T-shirt, have a few laughs and talk about the new CD project. (NOTE: This does not include travel or accommodations).
Birmingham, AL  - V.I.P. Elite Concert Tickets

Anyone who pledges 100.00 will receive the 1st single, full concert video, full New CD download (one month before actual street date), t-shirt, House of Praise CD, autographed Game Changer CD, and "2 VIP tickets" to a Carman concert of your choice over the 12 months in or near Montgomery, AL. 
These VIP Elite tickets include an after show meet and greet with Carman so you can say hello in person, take a picture, sign a T-shirt, have a few laughs and chat about the new Kickstarter CD project. 
(NOTE: This does not include travel or accommodations).

You will receive the single, video, download  (one month before actual street date), t-shirt, the new CD, House of Praise CD, autographed Game Changers CD, VIP tickets
plus a full-time membership of my VIP road crew with our all new Carman World Outreach VIP Tour jacket. Everyone will know your part of an elite team of evangelists who have won over one million people to Christ.

You will get the single, video, download (one month before actual street date), t-shirt, the new CD, House of Praise CD, autographed Game Changers CD, VIP tickets, the tour jacket 
plus a one week online webcam access to the final mix. 2-3 hours each night the cameras will be turned on and you can watch me and the recording crew go through the exciting process of mixing the cd.

Not only will you get the single, video, download (one month before actual street date), t-shirt, the new CD, House of Praise CD, autographed Game Changers CD, VIP tickets, tour jacket, webam mix 
but you will also get a phone-call from me personally to discuss the vision for this album and answer any questions you might have. This is a serious commitment on your part and I would want you to know personally, from my heart, how much your gift means to me.
These next levels of commitment are what takes an album from good to great. And if your giving at these next 4 levels then your name should be associated with this production.

So for anyone who gives $2,500 you not only get the single, video, download (one month before actual street date), t-shirt, the new CD, House of Praise CD, autographed Game Changers CD, VIP tickets, tour jacket, webam mix, and phone-call but you will also get your name listed on the CD cover art as an "EXECUTIVE PRODUCER" Yes that's right. From this point on, and forevermore, you will actually have a producer credit to add to your resume.

Get ready for the bonus where everything changes. For anyone who gives $5,000 you will get to sing on the record. Yes that's right. Don't worry about how good you are or not. I'll find a place for you to use whatever vocal talents you have somewhere on this project.
